IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ENDING DOMESTIC AND DATING VIOLENCE THROUGH INTERVENTION, AWARENESS AND PREVENTION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: DELIVERING SOLUTIONS TO END DOMESTIC AND DATING VIOLENCE THROUGH INTERVENTION, AWARENESS AND PREVENTION.
IRS990.Desc: RESIDENTIAL PROGRAMS:THE AGENCY HAS TWO RESIDENTIAL PROGRAMS IN THE CITY OF BOSTON FOR SURVIVORS AND CHILDREN MADE HOMELESS BY DOMESTIC VIOLENCE: THE MARY L. FOREMAN EMERGENCY SHELTER AND THE TEEN PARENTING PROGRAM (TPP). SERVING INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES, THE TOTAL PER-NIGHT CAPACITY IS 18 ADULTS AND 26 CHILDREN. TPP SPECIALIZES IN SUPPORTS FOR PREGNANT AND PARENTING TEENS MADE HOMELESS BY FAMILY OR DOMESTIC VIOLENCE. IN ADDITION, CASA MYRNA OPERATES A HOUSING PROGRAM FOR SURVIVORS OF COMMERCIAL SEXUAL EXPLOITATION. IN RECENT YEARS, CASA MYRNA HAS EXPANDED OUR HOUSING SERVICES TO INCLUDE A RAPID REHOUSING PROGRAM WHERE SURVIVORS MOVE QUICKLY FROM HOMELESSNESS TO PERMANENT HOUSING WITH RENTAL SUPPORT FOR UP TO TWO YEARS FROM CASA MYRNA.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SUPPORTIVE SERVICES:PROGRAMS INCLUDE COMMUNITY-BASED ADVOCATES AT LOCAL COURTS AND HEALTH CENTERS, LEGAL ADVOCACY SERVICES, HOUSING SEARCH ASSISTANCE AND ADVOCACY, FINANCIAL LITERACY/BUDGETING WORKSHOPS AND REFERRALS TO VOCATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, PROGRAMMING FOR CHILDREN, AND SUPPORT GROUPS AND INDIVIDUAL COUNSELING. PROVIDES PUBLIC AWARENESS CAMPAIGNS, OUTREACH MATERIALS AND EDUCATION ON THE ISSUE OF DOMESTIC AND DATING VIOLENCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SAFELINK:CASA MYRNA OPERATES MASSACHUSETTS' MULTILINGUAL, 24/7 DOMESTIC VIOLENCE HOTLINE. ADVOCATES PROVIDE CRISIS INTERVENTION, SUPPORTIVE LISTENING, SAFETY PLANNING AND REFERRALS TO DOMESTIC VIOLENCE SHELTERS AND COMMUNITY-BASED PROGRAMS ACROSS THE STATE. PROVIDES PUBLIC AWARENESS CAMPAIGNS, OUTREACH MATERIALS AND EDUCATION ON THE ISSUE OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: THE EVA CENTER:THE EVA CENTER IS A SURVIVOR-LED, SOCIAL JUSTICE ORIENTED PROGRAM WHOSE MISSION IS TO EMPOWER WOMEN WHO HAVE EXPERIENCED SEXUAL EXPLOITATION (PROSTITUTION, SEX TRAFFICKING) TO FIND SOLUTIONS TO THE ISSUES THEY FACE AND EXIT THE COMMERCIAL SEX INDUSTRY. THE EVA CENTER ALSO WORKS TO CHALLENGE PUBLIC PERCEPTIONS AND STRONGLY ADVOCATE FOR SPECIALIZED, SURVIVOR-LED, STRENGTH-BASED PROGRAMMING THAT INCREASES AWARENESS OF THE MANY SOCIO-ECONOMIC AND SITUATIONAL FACTORS CONTRIBUTING TO WOMEN AND GIRLS' ENTRY INTO THE SEX TRADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TAX POSITION: THE ORGANIZATION CURRENTLY EVALUATES ALL TAX POSITIONS AND MAKES A DETERMINATION REGARDING THE LIKELIHOOD OF THOSE POSITIONS BEING UPHELD UNDER REVIEW. THE PRIMARY TAX POSITION MADE BY CMV IS THE EXISTENCE OF UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX AND THE ORGANIZATION'S STATUS AS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ORGANIZATION DOES INCUR A LIABILITY FOR BOTH FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES ON THE INCOME, IF ANY, RELATED TO THE OPERATIONS OF ITS LEASED COMMERCIAL PROPERTIES, WHICH IS CLASSIFIED AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME, AS DEFINED BY IRC SECTION 512(A)(1). FOR THE YEARS PRESENTED, THERE WERE NO INCOME TAXES DUE FROM THE RENTAL OF COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE. WHEN APPLICABLE, THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES THE TAX EXPENSE FOR UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME WHEN PAID.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: EMERGENCY SERVICES - SHELTER, FOOD, CLOTHING AND BASIC NEEDS
GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: GIFT CARDS FOR SHELTER, FOOD, CLOTHING AND PERSONAL SUPPLIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HUD RENTAL ASSISTANCE - AS PART OF A HUD FUNDED RAPID-REHOUSING PROGRAM, CASA MYRNA PROVIDES RENTAL ASSISTANCE FOR ELIGIBLE SURVIVORS, AS DETERMINED BY THE CITY OF BOSTON. FOLLOWING GUIDELINES ESTABLISHED BY HUD AND THE CITY OF BOSTON, RENTAL PAYMENTS ARE MADE DIRECTLY TO LANDLORDS UPON APPROVAL OF ELIGIBILITY AND OTHER REQUIRED DOCUMENTATION. HOUSING STABILIZATION - CASA MYRNA SUPPORTS SURVIVORS' HOUSING STABILIZATION COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH RETAINING OR ATTAINING STABLE HOUSING, INCLUDING FIRST MONTH, LAST MONTH, SECURITY DEPOSIT, RENT ARREARAGE, AND UTILITY ARREARAGE. REQUESTS FOR ASSISTANCE ARE MADE THROUGH A PROCESS WITH A COMMUNITY ADVOCACY OR HOUSING SPECIALIST, AND APPROVED BY THE PROGRAM MANAGER AND DIRECTOR OF FINANCE. PAYMENTS ARE MADE DIRECTLY TO THE LANDLORD OR VENDOR ON BEHALF OF THE PARTICIPANT. EMERGENCY SERVICES - BASIC NEEDS - FOOD, CLOTHING AND PERSONAL SUPPLIES ARE PROVIDED TO RESIDENTS AND PROGRAM PARTICIPANTS FLEEING FROM DOMESTIC VIOLENCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AFTER THE DRAFT 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE CEO AND THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE BY THE AUDITORS, THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE PROVIDES THE DRAFT 990 TO EACH MEMBER OF THE FINANCE,AUDIT, AND INVESTMENT COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE DOCUMENT AND MAKES RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE FULL BOARD FOR COMMENTS AND/OR A VOTE FOR THE FORMAL BOARD MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND MANAGEMENT PERSONNEL AT THE LEVEL OF MANAGER OR ABOVE, SHALL SUBMIT AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT TO THE PRESIDENT OF CMV AND SHALL PROMPTLY SUPPLEMENT THAT STATEMENT, AS APPROPRIATE, IF THE INFORMATION CONTAINED ON THEIR MOST RECENT DISCLOSURE STATEMENT IS NOT FULLY ACCURATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A TOTAL COMPENSATION AMOUNT WILL BE ESTABLISHED FOR EACH SENIOR MANAGER/EXECUTIVE POSITION BASED UPON THREE FACTORS: A. A SURVEY OF THE MARKETPLACE WHICH INCLUDES ORGANIZATIONS OF SIMILAR MISSION, SIMILAR BUDGET SIZE AND/OR SIMILAR NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES. THIS INFORMATION WILL BE GATHERED FROM A REVIEW OF THE IRS 990 FORMS WHICH ARE NOW AVAILABLE ON-LINE AT MASS.GOV AND THROUGH SURVEYS IF THE INFORMATION FROM THE 990S IS INSUFFICIENT. B. THE SCOPE OF RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE POSITION. C. THE GOALS ESTABLISHED FOR THAT POSITION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CASA MYRNA VAZQUEZ, INC. MAKES ITS CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE ON THEIR WEBSITE AT WWW.CASAMYRNA.ORG. OTHER ITEMS, INCLUDING GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
